info.name: FBurger API
info.description:
Backend API for FBurger - A burger restaurant application with authentication, products, reviews, users management, and dashboard statistics.

## Authentication
Most endpoints require JWT authentication via Bearer token in the Authorization header.

## Base URL
Use the `{{baseUrl}}` variable (default: http://localhost:3000/api)

## Roles
- **admin**: Full access to all endpoints
- **user**: Can view products and create reviews
- **visitor**: Can view products and create account

request.description: Check if the API server is running and healthy.

item.name: Auth

request.description:
Register a new user account.

**Validation:**
- userName: 3-30 characters
- email: Valid email format
- password: Min 8 chars, must contain uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character
Authenticate user and receive access token. Refresh token is set as HTTP-only cookie.
Logout current user and invalidate refresh token.
Get a new access token using the refresh token stored in cookies.

item.description: Authentication endpoints for user registration, login, logout, and token refresh.

item.name: Products

request.description: Retrieve all products. This is a public endpoint.
Retrieve a specific product by its ID. This is a public endpoint.

request.description:
Create a new product. Requires admin authentication.

**Validation:**
- name: 3-100 characters
- category: Required
- image: Valid URL
- price: Positive number
- description: Max 1000 characters
Update an existing product. Requires admin authentication. All fields are optional.
Delete a product by ID. Requires admin authentication.

item.description: Product management endpoints. Public access for viewing, admin access required for create/update/delete.

item.name: Reviews

request.description: Retrieve all reviews. This is a public endpoint.

Create a new review. Requires authentication.

**Validation:**
- rating: Integer between 1-5
- content: 10-500 characters
Update an existing review. Requires admin authentication.
Delete a review by ID. Requires admin authentication.

item.description: Review management endpoints. Public access for viewing, authenticated users can create, admins can update/delete.

item.name: Users

request.description: Retrieve all users. Requires admin authentication.
Delete a user by ID. Requires admin authentication. Admin cannot delete their own account.

Update a user's role. Requires admin authentication.

**Valid roles:** admin, user, visitor

item.description: User management endpoints. All endpoints require admin authentication.

item.name: Dashboard

request.description: Get dashboard statistics including total counts of users, products, and reviews. Requires admin authentication.
